title: Best of The Program |  Guest: John Cooper | 5/25/21
description:
Pat Gray joins to discuss Beto O’Rourke possibly running for governor of Texas, actor Mark Ruffalo’s surprising comments on Israel, and the origin of COVID-19. John Cooper, lead singer of Skillet, joins to review his new book, “Awake & Alive To Truth,” and the “false religion” of critical race theory that’s being taught even in our churches. The cryptocurrency market is dropping, but is Elon Musk or China to blame?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

content:encoded:
Pat Gray joins to discuss Beto O’Rourke possibly running for governor of Texas, actor Mark Ruffalo’s surprising comments on Israel, and the origin of COVID-19. John Cooper, lead singer of Skillet, joins to review his new book, “Awake & Alive To Truth,” and the “false religion” of critical race theory that’s being taught even in our churches. The cryptocurrency market is dropping, but is Elon Musk or China to blame?
